summary: High-Definition Retextures of several items of clothing from the Dragonborn DLC
descriptionHtml:
Another of my mediocre retexture mods, hooray! In my boredom, I decided to have a go at retexturing several items from Dragonborn. Hopefully they should look good enough for the average player.

CONTAINS:

Cultist Robes
Telvanni Robes
Temple Priest Robes
DB Dragon Priest masks
Skaal amulet

Most are just improved versions of the defaults, although the colouring of the cultist robes has also been modified slightly.

Any feedback is welcome, the mod exists just to slightly improve the visual quality of the DLC
author: R97R
